trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Krzysztof Stankiewicz is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Krzysztof Stankiewicz has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krzysztof Stankiewicz makes two attacks with its Arcane Slam.

action.name: Arcane Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) bludgeoning plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage.

action.name: Spellcasting
entries:
Krzysztof Stankiewicz is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): mirror image, misty step, scorching ray
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
- 4th level (3 slots): ice storm, polymorph, wall of fire
- 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, hold monster, telekinesis
- 6th level (2 slots): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
- 7th level (2 slots): prismatic spray, teleport
- 8th level (1 slot): mind blank, power word stun
- 9th level (1 slot): time stop, true polymorph
